name: RadioTunes(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, tell radio tunes play chillout”
”Alexa, tell radio tunes play eurodance”
”Alexa, tell radio tunes play top hits”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio tunes
des:
With this skill you can play all radio streams of RadioTunes directly on your amazon echo. But to use it, a premium account of RadioTunes is absolutely neccessary. Cannot be used with the free account.

When activating this skill you need to configure account linking. There you have to enter the listen key. The listen key can be found on the RadioTunes page on "Player Settings".
